Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Pemberton Valley Lodge in Pemberton, you'll be in the mountains and close to Big Sky Golf and Country Club and Pemberton Distillery. This eco-friendly condo is within close proximity of The Meadows at Pemberton Golf Course and Nairn Falls Provincial Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 85 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and body treatments. A spa tub and a steam room offer a relaxing way to wind down after a day on the slopes. This condo also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and ski storage. You'll be on the slopes in no time with the complimentary ski shuttle.

Dining
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Pemberton Valley Lodge, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Pemberton? This condo has facilities measuring 5382 square feet (500 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Pemberton Valley Lodge, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Meadows at Pemberton Golf Course - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Big Sky Golf and Country Club - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Nairn Falls Provincial Park - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Pemberton Distillery - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Nicklaus North Golf Course - 22.1 km / 13.7 mi
Meadow Park Sports Centre - 22.4 km / 13.9 mi
Squamish Lil'wat Cultural Centre - 24.4 km / 15.2 mi
Whistler Marketplace - 24.6 km / 15.3 mi
Whistler Medals Plaza - 24.7 km / 15.3 mi
Rainbow Trail - 24.7 km / 15.4 mi
Whistler Museum - 24.9 km / 15.4 mi

Family Adventure Zone - 24.9 km / 15.5 mi
Whistler Visitor Centre - 25 km / 15.5 mi
Blackcomb Excalibur Gondola - 25.2 km / 15.6 mi

The preferred airport for Pemberton Valley Lodge is Vancouver, BC (YVR-Vancouver Intl.) - 127.6 km / 79.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
